string-array.name: about_text_items
string-array.item: Jamie Miller, Andrey Shprengel, Morgan Garske, Brian Bauer, Jacob Rail and Jack Skinner

An app to take a picture of a plant, determine if it is a flowering alpine species called Silene acaulis, and record the plant\'s location. This data will be sent to a server where Nathalie Chardon and other researchers can use this to find the range of the alpine plant species.
